column4: Is the default i386 image or the live cd recommended for a new ubuntu user?
depends if you want to install it to hard disk (which could overwrite your OS you already have installed if you don't know what you're doing)
I'll remove everything currently installed so it doesnt matter. which one will be the best choice for me then?
running from a livecd is always slower, and doesn't let you really change much, so I'd recommend just grabbing the i386 iso
